table_caption: Brain volumetric comparisons with normalized values.
table_foot: WMH = white matter hyperintensities; CN = Cognitively Normal; MCI = Mild Cognitive Impairment; AD = Alzheimer Dementia; volume expressed in mm3 (1) and ml (2).Post hoc analysis: *AD vs CN, P = 0.004; † AD vs CN, P = 0.013; † AD vs MCI, P = 0.009; § AD vs CN, P = 0.001; §AD vs MCI, P = 0.012; values are displayed as mean ± standard deviations;
